name: Black Eyes/Sclera
description: Lora trained on the concept of black eyes / black sclera, it was trained on SD1.5 so it works well with almost any model, be it anime or realistic. It's intended to be used at 1.0-0.5 No activation token is needed, you vary the strength to get different colors and levels of eye-filling

meta.prompt:
portrait, woman in dress, looking at the camera, realistic,
 <lora:blackeyes-v1:1>
meta.negativePrompt: EasyNegative, frame, (watermark:1.5), multiple views, (((duplicate))), (bad legs), one leg, (bad face), (bad eyes), ((bad hands, bad anatomy, bad feet, error, missing fingers, fewer digits, cropped:1.0)), (worst quality, low quality:1.4), normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, ((watermark)), (username), blurry, out of focus, censorship, ugly, old, wide face, ((fused fingers)), (((too many fingers))) odd, fat, lowres, text, error, out of frame, (cloned face:1.3), (mutilated:1.3), (deformed:1.3), (gross proportions:1.3), (disfigured:1.3), (mutated hands:1.3), (poorly drawn hands:1.3), (bad hands:1.3), extra digit, (extra fingers:1.3), (poorly drawn feet:1.3), long neck, extra limbs, broken limb, asymmetrical eyes, artist name,
